prodNameC: "奧素"第三代C型肝炎酵素聯結免疫試劑
prodNameE: ORTHO HCV 3.0 ELISA TEST SYSTEM WITH ENHANCED SAVE
indicationsName: 酵素聯結免疫吸附分析法定性測試人類血清或血漿中的C型肝炎抗體，篩檢用。
ingredientsDesc:
480 test kit:
5 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Encoded Antigen (Recombinant c22-3, c200 and NS5 Coated Microwell Plastes (96 wells each)-C22-3, c200, and NS5 derived from yeast.
1 Bottle Conjugate: Antibody to Human IgG (Murine Monoclonal) (125 ml)-anti-human IgG heavy chain (murine monoclonal) conjugated to horseradish peroxidase with protein with bovine protein stabilizers. Preservtive: 1% ProClin 300 
1 Bottle Specimen Diluent (190mL)-phosphate-buffered saline with bovine protein stabilizers Preservative: 0.1% 2-chloroacetamide
1 vial OPD Tablets (30 tablets)-contains o-phenylenediamine. 2HCL
1 Bottle Substrate Buffer (190 mL)-citrate-phosphate buffer with 0.02% hydrogen peroxide Perservative: 0.1% 2-chloroacetamide

1 Vial Positive Control (Human)(1.2mL) Source: Inactivated human serum or plasma containing anti-HCV and nonreactive for hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) and antibody to human immunodeficiency virus type 1 (HIV-1) and type 2(HIV-2) Preservative: 0.2% sodium azide and 0.9/EDTA 21 Plate Sealers, Disposable
applicantName: 台灣大昌華嘉股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市內湖區堤頂大道二段407巷20弄1、3、5、7號10樓及22、24、26號10樓及22號10樓之1
efficacy: 酵素聯結免疫吸附分析法定性測試人類血清或血漿中的C型肝炎抗體，篩檢用。

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 1001 U.S. HIGHWAY 202, RARITAN, NEW JERSEY 08869 U.S.A.
